snippet: "Inadmissible," a new play by D.B. Gilles, parodies the college admissions process to help applicants laugh at their anxiety.
abstract: "Inadmissible," a new play by D.B. Gilles, parodies the college admissions process to help applicants laugh at their anxiety.
lead_paragraph: Admissions boards can seem capricious and impenetrable, if not malignant, to many prospective freshmen.

headline.main: On the Stage, an Insider's View of College Admissions
